message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have less, I'm feeling generous, but not that generous!
I'll give you a bigger share, but not that big! You can't have all the cake!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect too much!
You're running out of money, I'm running out of patience!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you almost all of it, but I'm not going to go broke!
You're getting close to broke, I'm getting close to rich!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you almost all of it, but I'm not going to go broke... again!
